metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8241 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
In all Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a buffer overflowvulnerability exists in a WLAN function due to an incorrect message length.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8241` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.19.0-18-generic - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-generic-lpae - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-lowlatency - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc-e500mc - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc-smp - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc64-emb - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-18-powerpc64-smp - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-3.19.0-18-generic - 3.19.0-18.18~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1002-aws - 4.4.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
